name: microcookiepkg
description: MicroCookie - A minuscule cookie library. Nothing but bones. Compatible with every single browser.

scripts.distprep: if [ ! -d  dist ]; then mkdir dist; fi
scripts.uglyhtm: uglifyjs microcookie.js -o dist/microcookie-min.js -m reserved=\[k,v,p,e,o,d,w,m,y\] --comments -c passes=5 --ie --v8 && npm run-script htmlprep
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run-script distprep && npm run-script uglyhtm && npm run-script uglynpm

author: Nathan Hedge (10Nates)
